testimonials.text: I was lucky enough to report to Mike. He truly is a Swiss Army knife - willing to get his hands dirty while sharing knowledge with every team member involved. His eagerness to continue learning every day is infectious and makes everyone in his orbit better for having been around him.

I have had the pleasure of working with Mike on various projects and can rely on him to come through with the best possible solution for any problem I bring to his doorstep. His innate level of professionalism and upbeat nature is contagious and brings out the best in those that work with him, for him and simply put, anyone within earshot. His unwavering enthusiasm for life, family and work are second to none. Mike's ability to continuously solve problems while simultaneously deciphering ways to streamline the company's enterprise architecture makes him an extremely invaluable asset.

Michael helped our company step outside of our environment and think about how we might operate differently to improve productivity and quality of performance. With his expertise in the application of Lean Sigma and his ability to teach it, we tackled many problems and developed solutions that we are now implementing.
